subject: Missing Haptics Reactor in order #SSN3997
description_text: Hello, Since I have not had a reply, im writing another email.  I've recieved pedals but no reactors with my order, when are they being sent Best regards, Maris

conversations.body_text: Hi Māris Vasariņš,    This is another link for you. It is expected to arrive within the next couple of days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2533500710735268
